knimeNode.name: Splitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits the columns of the input table into two output tables.

fullDescription.intro: This node splits the columns of the input table into two output tables. Specify in the dialog which columns should occur in the top table (left list), and the bottom table (right list). Use the buttons to move columns from one list to the other.

tab.name: Column Filter
tab.option: A list of column names that make up the first output table (top output port).

Select this option to enforce the current top list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the included columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the bottom list.)
Use these buttons to move columns between the Top and Bottom list.

Use one of these fields to search either within the Top or Bottom list for certain column names or name substrings. Repeated clicking of the search button marks the next column that matches the search text. The check box 'Mark all search hits' causes all matching columns to be selected making them movable between the two lists.
A list of column names that make up the second output table (bottom output port).

Select this option to enforce the current exclusion list to stay the same even if the input table specification changes. If some of the bottom columns are not available anymore, a warning is displayed. (New columns will automatically be added to the Top list.)

ports.outPort: Input table with the columns as defined in the dialog's left list.
Input table with the columns as defined in the dialog's right list.
